txt.en: 'You have slain one of the Black Word's knights? I praise you for your valiant efforts.'

'Within the bones of Barad-dûr lie many secrets and strange objects collected by Sauron during his reign of Mordor. If we were to penetrate the ruined tower's defences, we may just yet be able to obtain some of these lost relics. Many I am sure rightfully belong to Gondor. I fear the Barad-dûr is still under command of those who serve the Black Word. Are you willing to risk a dive into the Sauron's ruins for Gondor?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest has a one hour time limit. The timer will begin upon accepting the quest. This quest can be completed with one or two adventurers.</rgb>
Barad-dûr: Realm of the Black Word
A wealth of lore awaits those who brave the Bones of Barad-dûr.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest has a one hour time limit. The timer will begin upon accepting the quest.</rgb>
You should return to Candúr and apprise him of your efforts.
